Ping.description: Replies with a pong, just to test the bot is working

Rules.description: Show the rules of the game

Leaderboard.description: Show who's in the lead with total amount of boom coins

Start.description: Start a game of Click Click Boom. Use !start {amount} to raise the stakes | Example: !start 50

Click.description: When it's your turn, click the bomb

Pass.description: When it's your turn, pass the bomb at the cost of the pass

Loan.description: If you run out of coins, you can call for a loan with !loan {amount}

Pay.description: Use !pay {amount} to pay back a portion of your debt

Stats.description: See stats for yourself. use !info {person} to see stats for another player

Current.description: Get the current status of the game
